remote-control.name: Remote Control
remote-control.desc: Friendly mechs within **12" and LoS** may expend one action each activation on this system's actions.

damageable.name: Damageable
damageable.desc: This terrain is treated like a mech for targetting purposes and it will perform Resistance Flips when it receives hits. It can never gain conditions.

remove.name: Remove
remove.result: Remove the associated terrain from the board.
